languages.text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.
languages.original_text: На амбулла не действуют эффекты, меняющие {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетную цель{/g}. Он выбирает приоритетную цель среди тех, что находятся на рыхлой земле (на них действует эффект {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) Он наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects those among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

Он выбирает приоритетную цель среди тех, что находятся на рыхлой земле (на них действует эффект {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) Он наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

На амбулла не действуют эффекты, меняющие {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетную цель{/g}. Он выбирает приоритетную цель среди тех, что находятся на рыхлой земле (на них действует эффект {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) Он наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

languages.text: Ambul, {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefini{/g} değiştiren etkilere karşı bağışıktır ve hedefini çürük zeminde duranlar arasından ({g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}zeminde durma!{/g} etkisi ile) seçer. Saldırısına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılmış olsa bile bu hedeflere ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambul, {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefini{/g} değiştiren etkilere karşı bağışıktır ve hedefini çürük zeminde duranlar arasından ({g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}zeminde durma!{/g} etkisi ile) seçer. Saldırısına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılmış olsa bile bu hedeflere ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.

languages.text: Un ambull es inmune a los efectos que cambian su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} y selecciona objetivos que estén sobre terreno blando (con el efecto {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}¡no pises la tierra!{/g}). Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a esos objetivos incluso aunque el ataque sea {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parado{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un ambull es inmune a los efectos que cambian su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} y selecciona objetivos que estén sobre terreno blando (con el efecto {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}¡no pises la tierra!{/g}). Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a esos objetivos incluso aunque el ataque sea {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parado{/g}.

languages.text: 蚁牛不会因任何效果而改变{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，会在处于松散地面上的目标（也就是受{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}离开地面！{/g}效果影响的目标）中进行选择。蚁牛的攻击会对处于松散地面上的目标造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，即便此次攻击被目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，也依然会造成额外伤害。
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 蚁牛不会因任何效果而改变{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，会在处于松散地面上的目标（也就是受{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}离开地面！{/g}效果影响的目标）中进行选择。蚁牛的攻击会对处于松散地面上的目标造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，即便此次攻击被目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，也依然会造成额外伤害。

languages.text: L'ambull bénéficie d'une immunité contre les effets qui changent sa {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} et choisit parmi les cibles se trouvant sur un sol meuble (avec l'effet {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Sol dangereux{/g}). Il leur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, même si l'attaque est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'ambull bénéficie d'une immunité contre les effets qui changent sa {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} et choisit parmi les cibles se trouvant sur un sol meuble (avec l'effet {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Sol dangereux{/g}). Il leur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, même si l'attaque est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.

languages.text: アンブルは{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}を変更する効果に耐性があり、（{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}その地面から離れろ！{/g}の効果によって）緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットから選択する。これにより、たとえ攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}された場合でも、ターゲットに追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アンブルは{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}を変更する効果に耐性があり、（{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}その地面から離れろ！{/g}の効果によって）緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットから選択する。これにより、たとえ攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}された場合でも、ターゲットに追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Ambullen sind immun gegen Effekte, die ihr {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} ändern und wählen Ziele auf lockerem Boden (mit dem Effekt {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Weg vom Boden!{/g}) aus. Sie fügen diesen Zielen selbst dann zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder den Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull is immune to effects that change its {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and selects among targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambullen sind immun gegen Effekte, die ihr {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} ändern und wählen Ziele auf lockerem Boden (mit dem Effekt {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Weg vom Boden!{/g}) aus. Sie fügen diesen Zielen selbst dann zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder den Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
